PARAMETERS_LATEX: P_{{A1}}: \text{{Prices}}, P_{{A2}}: \text{{Prices}}, P_{{A3}}: \text{{Prices}}, R_{{A1}}: \text{{Costs}}, R_{{A2}}: \text{{Costs}}, R_{{A3}}: \text{{Costs}}, C_{{A1}}: \text{{ActivationCosts}}, C_{{A2}}: \text{{ActivationCosts}}, C_{{A3}}: \text{{ActivationCosts}}, B_{{A1}}: \text{{MinimumBatches}}, B_{{A2}}: \text{{MinimumBatches}}, B_{{A3}}: \text{{MinimumBatches}}, D: \text{{Days}}, L: \text{{TotalProductionLimit}}, T_{{A1}}: \text{{ActivationTimeA1}}
CONSTRAINTS_LATEX: x_{{A1}} + x_{{A2}} + x_{{A3}} \leq \frac{L}{53}, x_{{A1}} \geq 1 + x_{{A1}} \cdot \frac{T_{{A1}}}{60}, x_{{A1}} \cdot 5300 \leq 100 \cdot P_{{A1}} \cdot D, x_{{A2}} \cdot 4500 \leq 100 \cdot P_{{A2}} \cdot D, x_{{A3}} \cdot 5400 \leq 100 \cdot P_{{A3}} \cdot D, \sum_{{A1}} C_{{A1}} x_{{A1}} + \sum_{{A1}} C_{{A1}} x_{{A1}} \cdot \frac{T_{{A1}}}{60} + \sum_{{A1}} B_{{A1}} x_{{A1}} \leq L \cdot 100 \cdot R_{{A1}} + L \cdot 100 \cdot R_{{A2}} + L \cdot 100 \cdot R_{{A3}}
